attributes.long-description:
This bundle includes the VEV: Viva Ex Vivo full game, 5 dynamic 3-D themes based on the 5 main sample types featured in the game, as well as 3 unique dynamic themes featured in the game's bonus levels:

Freshwater
Soil
Red Blood Cells
Cerebrospinal Fluid
Calibration Matrix
Hanami (Cherry Blossom)
Azure Earth Orbital
Crystal Clock

VEV: Viva Ex Vivo™‎ is a unique, pick-up and play action game with puzzle and survival elements. Players take control of a 'Virtual Eukaryote Visualizer,' a single-celled artificial life-form which allows them to explore four distinct microscopic environments: freshwater, soil, blood, and cerebrospinal fluid. Players are tasked with managing their VEV's energy consumption as they traverse each sample in search of organic particles to collect and consume, ultimately achieving the highest possible energy count within their VEV's functional life span.

-

One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

Truant Pixel, LLC
attributes.name: VEV: Viva Ex Vivo™‎ VR Edition Complete Bundle
